thread.title: Great little hotel wit a view of the Arc de Triomph
thread.title_full: Great little hotel wit a view of the Arc de Triomph - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Soepkip
title: Great little hotel wit a view of the Arc de Triomph
text:
Located very conveniently at the exit of the metro and the stop of Le Bus Direct, the perfect transport from CDG to downtown. The hotel is typically french, their rooms are super clean and are quite spaceous. I had a room with a small balcony, which gives you direct views of the Arc de Triomph. This is a much nicer stay then in one of the big name hotel chains. The staff is so kind and trying to give you the home-feeling. The breakfast buffet, while sitting in a nice glass solarium, is delicious.
Room Tip: I stayed on the highest floor, which was very quiet. See more room tips
